title: Which Journey songs are power ballads? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Faithfully” (my top favorite), “Send Her My Love”, “Separate Ways (Worlds Apart)”, “I’ll be Alright Without You”, “Girl Can’t Help It” (album version), “Once You Love Somebody”, “The Eyes of a Woman”, “Why Can’t This Night Go on Forever?”, “Open Arms”, “Who’s Crying Now?”, “Where Did I Lose Your Love?”, and “Don’t Stop Believin’” are quite a few power ballads by Journey that I’m aware of and love to pieces!

Journey became quite famous for power ballads, which include “Open Arms”, “Who's Crying Now”, “Still They Ride” (from Escape); “Faithfully”, “Send Her My Love”, “After the Fall” (from Frontiers); “I'll Be Alright Without You” (from Raised on Radio) and “When You Love a Woman” (from Trial by Fire).
Many of Journey’s songs are power ballads. The two that come immediately to mind are “Who’s Crying Now” from Escape and “After The Fall” from Frontiers…
